SamPy.db.sqlite.get_data_sqlitePowerTen¶

SamPy.db.sqlite.get_data_sqlitePowerTen(path, db, query)¶

Run an SQL query to a database with a custom made function “toPowerTen”.

Parameters:
  • path (string) – path to the SQLite3 database
  • db (string) – name of the SQLite3 database
  • query (string) – valid SQL query
Returns:

all requested data
Return type:

ndarray
